name: Sci-Fi Escape
description: This is my second project for my Game Development course at HPU. For this project, I used Unreal Engine's FPS starter template to create an escape room game. The theme for this game was inspired by UE4's starter content materials that give it a very sci-fi look. I was exposed to many of the software's features such as blueprints, widgets, lighting, and materials. Due to time constraints, the game isn't very fleshed out or really close to being a finished product. I think in my free time I'd definitely like to go back to this and see what improvements I can make!
